definition: lit. such a fool as to die from holding in one's pee (idiom)/fig. unable to solve a problem due to the inflexibility of one's thinking
pinyin: huo2 ren2 rang4 niao4 bie1 si3

definition: to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
to choke/to stifle/to restrain/to hold back/to hold in (urine)/to hold (one's breath)
